alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Pontotoc; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 16 at 2:01AM CDT until April 16 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LAFAYETTE...NORTHWESTERN PONTOTOC AND SOUTHWESTERN UNION COUNTIES... At 200 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cambridge, or 9 miles northeast of Oxford, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Cambridge, Denmark, Pinedale, Etta, Thaxton, Abbeville, Toccopola, Altus, Hortontown, Keel, Poolville, Martintown, Esperanza, Ingomar, Burt, Bald Hill, Delay, Buchannan, College Hill Station and Lafayette Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
